cause.description:
We want to Learn through music---If u love music then u will love this cause we want to spread music throughout the world and maybe even dance...if u dont believe u can learn through music u dont believe at all.
From music u can learn about other cultures and maybe even to sing and dance. Everyone is different and that is one of the messages beling spread through music. You will also be able to tell the story in a song.
1. People without the ability to listen to music should be able to.
2. We together need to spread music throughout the world.
3. We must Learn from music.
cause.name: Music For All
